snippet: The man in custody, Luis Ortiz, was wanted for questioning in the shooting of a drug addict in Brooklyn.
abstract: Luis Ortiz, in custody for shooting New York City Police officer Kevin Brennan in the Bushwick section of Brooklyn, was wanted for questioning in the January murder of Shannon McKinney in the same area; Brennan is expected to make a full recovery.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Al Baker, Corey Kilgannon, Nate Schweber and Tim Stelloh.

lead_paragraph: The man in custody, Luis Ortiz, was wanted for questioning in the shooting of a drug addict in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Suspect in Custody in Case of Officer Shot in the Head
headline.main: Man Charged in Officer’s Shooting Had Been Sought in a Jan. 1 Killing
headline.print_headline: Man Charged in Officer’s Shooting Had Been Sought in a Jan. 1 Killing
